name: Cavejumper
description:
Description

A side-scrolling platform shooter game where you are to collect all coins and keys to escape the cave. While doing this you will need to avoid and kill enemies in your path.

Story

You are Dave the Cave Explorer. A middle aged man who explores caves for a living/hobby. He is clumsy, brave, and athletic. Dave has no fear, which is a good trait for someone who explores caves. He doesn't have much of a backstory other than his family and friends back at home in New Zealand. He is well trained with his whip skills and his shooting skills. He has gone overseas to explore a secret cave. Dave finds himself trapped in a deep dangerous environment and needs your help to collect all the treasure and keys, and to eliminate all enemies/monsters that stand in your way. Will you help Dave see his family again?

Trailer

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIZZ3Cab5fg&feature=youtu.be

Price

FREE

Key Features

- You have a whip!

- Awesome Animations!

- Minor Puzzles!

- Shoot, Reload, and Restock!

-Awesome Combat!

Platform

PC

Release Date

26/06/15

Me/Bio

Regan Booth. I am currently studying for a bachelors degree at Media Design School in New Zealand. Have been using game maker and am new to the software.
